summary: This document is a cover letter from Judge Richard M. Berman forwarding correspondence received by the court to the FBI's New York Field Office. The correspondence pertains to the case United States v. Jeffrey Epstein, over which Judge Berman presided. The document includes administrative routing information and appears to involve inmate mail from a correctional facility.

keyFacts: Judge Richard M. Berman presided over the criminal case United States v. Jeffrey Epstein (19 Cr 490).
In July 2020, correspondence regarding the Epstein case was received by the SDNY Clerk's Office and forwarded to Judge Berman, who then sent it to the FBI's New York Field Office.

The document includes routing information indicating it passed through the New York State Department of Corrections and Community Supervision Offender Correspondence Program, suggesting the original correspondence may have come from an inmate.
The correspondence was addressed to the "F.B.I. Director" but was forwarded to the Assistant Director in Charge of the New York Field Office.
